author: Nerdstalgic
description:
Once upon a time, the home video market was unstoppable. From VHS and DVD to Blu-ray and 4K, owning a physical copy of your favorite movie meant it was yours forever. No removals. No restrictions. Just press play.

But with the rise of streaming platforms, everything changed. On the surface, having millions of films and TV shows available 24/7 sounds like a dream. Yet as many fans have discovered, when your favorite movie or series suddenly vanishes from a streaming service… you’re left with no way to watch.

Do you prefer the convenience of streaming, or the security of physical media? Let us know in the comments!

#physicalmedia #streaming #netflix #amazonprime
title: All Your Favorite Movies Are Disappearing...
